tool.name: UDPipe
tool.help:
**What it Does**
Sends the input document to the `UDPipe service <https://lindat.mff.cuni.cz/en/services#UDPipe>`_ at Clarin Lindat for tokenization, part of speech tagging, lemmatization, and dependency parsing.
